notes: [Added] Added a very basic “Welcome” example widget.
[Improved] Made some UI improvements to the “Search” example widget, a spinner is now shown while results are loading.
[Fixed] The “Recent Assets” example widget now really shows the latest assets.
[Fixed] The widget’s ID passed in to the templates doesn’t contain the word `widget` any longer.
[Fixed] The `Craft.DiyWidget` object is now only created in the example Javascripts if it doesn’t already exist.
[Added] Added a new “Entry Search” example widget.
[Added] Added a `getHtml` controller action to request the templates using Ajax.
[Improved] Templates starting with an underscore are no longer listed in the widget settings.
